paragraphs: [[The pages of the BOOK OF REST AND ENDINGS are filled with obscure bits  of cult mumbo-jumbo. However, the following excerpt seems of some  interest.]]
THE RITUAL FOR ENDING OF WRATHMEN

From fifty Fathers
Frozen in slavepast
Rip from the wraithloom
Sunder the lifeweave
Lock tight in earthgrip
Hold firm in gravefast
